懘字的基本解释

懘
chì
〔惉懘〕见“
惉”。

懘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》尺制切，去祭，昌。］
［《廣韻》尺氏切，上紙，昌。］
不流畅，不和谐。参见“懘惉”、“懘籥”。

懘字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懘； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页406第24
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?尺制切，音掣。本作滯。或从心，亦作慸?，音敗。不和也。　又【集韻】丑例切。義同。或作㦅。　又【集韻】充至切，音痓。又【玉篇】【廣韻】尺氏切【韻會】敞爾切【正韻】尺里切，?音侈。義?同。

懘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
懘字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhang
Basic explanation of words
Zhang
chì
〔惉懘〕See "
Sorrowful".
Zhang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" ruler cutting, go to sacrifice, Chang. ]
["Guangyun" Chishi cut, put on paper, Chang. ]
Not smooth, not harmonious. See "Zhang Fang", "Zhang Hu".
Zhang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懘; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 406-24
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Ruler cutting, sound control. This is lagging. Or from the heart, also for the sorrow?, the sound is defeated. Discord also.　[Jiyun] Ugly case cut again. The same meaning. Or as 㦅.　[Jiyun] Fully to cut, sound 痓. Also [Jade articles] [Guangyun] Chi’s cut [Yunhui] Open Erqi [Zhengyun] Chili cut, the sound is extravagant. Righteous? Same.
Zhang
